string.value: #b#p1012109##k of #b#p1012109##k's book should be ready by now. I should go talk to him.
Apparenlty the #b#t4000144#s#k have disappeared to the direction of #b#m801000000##k. I need to find it and return it to its original state.
Apparently, #p9120011#'s doll just went about on its one way. Maybe this has something to do with #b#t4000144##k that #p1012109# is looking for...
Ah, you're the ... from the other day ...! Help! Please help me!

I'm really sorry about last time, and I also can't thank you enough for your constant help. The thing is, the #b#t4000144#s#k that you gathered up, started moving all of a sudden by itself, and just flew away...

No damage occurred, but it used to be part of the monster... if we leave it out like that, then something terrible may happen. I need your help! Please find the #b#t4000144##k that flew away from me. #b#t4000144##k may have flown to the direction of #b#m801000000##k. Maybe you should check out there for what you seek.
Oh well... just a little more, and I'll be done with this book ... can you recommend someone of your caliber for me? If only I could fight...
My doll just disappeared on me... what happened?
Did you find #b#t4000144##k that flew away to the direction of #b#m801000000##k?
